attributes.description:
## Overview
In this experiment we will be testing whether we can increase the amount of products added to the basket.

### What does success look like?
If this experiment is successful, we will see an increase in the amount of `ADD_TO_BASKET` events.

### What does failure look like?
We will consider this experiment a failure if the number of `ADD_TO_BASKET` events decreases.
An average number of events will not be considered a failure. Perhaps we need to try something else.

## Scope
This experiment will only affect the "Add to Basket" button designs across the site.
